title: Why are Japanese youth so engaged in playing musical instruments, especially guitars? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s the Confucianism influence, you’re supposed to practice over and over again until you get it perfect. That’s why in East Asia, people are so good at playing instruments, dancing, etc, but they’re not creative because it’s the skill that’s placed importance and not creativity.

I can’t say that it’s true, but all I can say is that their educational system does not look down upon music and arts as a subject, and likewise, the students take on these subjects with the same importance as STEM.
